name: EXTRACT
shortDescription: Extract time field unit from date
description: Extracts the time field component from a date or timestamp.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Unit for result (YEAR, MONTH, DAY, WEEKDAY, YEARDAY, HOUR, MINUTE, SECOND, NANOSECOND, MICROSECOND, MILLISECOND, MILLISECOND, EPOCHDAY, OFFSET_SECONDS)

examples.title: Get year
examples.sql: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) as year FROM orders

examples.title: Filter by day of week
examples.description: Get records from specific day of week
examples.sql: SELECT * FROM events WHERE EXTRACT(WEEKDAY FROM event_date) = 1

examples.title: Group by year
examples.sql:
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) as year, SUM(total) as total
FROM orders
GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date)
